dataset_id: SMAPVEX08 Land Cover Classification Map V001
organizations: National Snow and Ice Data Center
title: SMAPVEX08 Land Cover Classification Map V001
summary: This data set consists of land cover classification data derived from satellite imagery and of data obtained in the field as part of the Soil Moisture Active Passive Validation Experiment 2008 (SMAPVEX08).
